samples.task_definition: Calculate the total expenses for the month.
samples.task_input: List of expenses: Rent: $1200, Utilities: $300, Office Supplies: $150, Internet: $80, Maintenance: $200

samples.task_definition: Generate a report of sales by product.
samples.task_input: Sales data: Product A: 120 units, Product B: 90 units, Product C: 150 units

samples.task_definition: Calculate employee bonus based on sales performance.
samples.task_input: Employee sales: John Smith: $20000, Jane Doe: $25000, Employee bonus rate: 5%

samples.task_definition: Generate a list of overdue invoices.
samples.task_input: Invoices: Invoice 001: Due date 2023-01-15, Paid: No; Invoice 002: Due date 2023-01-20, Paid: Yes; Today's date: 2023-02-01

samples.task_definition: Automate email responses for common customer inquiries.
samples.task_input: Customer inquiry: 'What are your business hours?'

expected_output.email_response: Thank you for reaching out. Our business hours are Monday to Friday, 9 AM to 5 PM.
